div.p: [In the nth year of ] Imperator Caesar Domitian [Augustus Germanicus (?), (month, day), in (location) of the ...] nome. Horion, [son of NN, about ...]seven [years old,] scar under his [...] thumb, acknowledges [to NN, daughter of NN, (age, signalment), with her guardian NN, son of NN (age) ...] on his right, since s/he charged (?) ... in the nth year of Imperator Caesar ... before NN (?) ... judge, concerning the ... one thousand four hundred drachmas ... to the soldier, which he owed ... he has died according to ... six ... to cede to the same (woman) ... of four arouras or however much it may be ... two arouras in the place called Onkos ... to have previously ceded the ... in the same (?) ninth year in the month ... and the same (woman) ... hundred ...
